name: Behavioral Adjustment Facility Trial (BAF)
rewards: Incarnate Salvage, Empyrean Merits, Astral Merits
location: Echo Plaza: Use Long range teleport, TUNNEL, or East Pavillion truck in Pocket D

tips.name: Alarm Raiser Badge
tips.content: Whether by chutzpah or ignorance, you managed to assault the Behavioral Adjustment Facility without ever disabling a single one of their guard towers.
